params._seniorAsset: the expected senior asset value (senior debt + senior balance)

returns.juniorTokenPrice: the junior token price in RAY decimal (10^27)

returns.seniorTokenPrice: the senior token price in RAY decimal (10^27)

returns.juniorTokenPrice: the junior token price in RAY decimal (10^27)
returns.seniorTokenPrice: the senior token price in RAY decimal (10^27)

_rebase(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: internal function for the rebalance of senior debt and balance

calcExpectedSeniorAsset(uint256,uint256).notice: calculates the expected Senior asset value

calcExpectedSeniorAsset(uint256,uint256,.notice: expected senior return if no losses occur

calcJuniorRatio(uint256,uint256,uint256,.notice: returns the current junior ratio protection in the Tinlake

calcTokenPrices(uint256,uint256,uint256,.notice: calculates the senior and junior token price based on current NAV and reserve

changeSeniorAsset(DataTypes.Storage stor.notice: changes the senior asset value based on new supply or redeems

seniorDebt(DataTypes.Storage storage).notice: returns the senior debt with up to date interest
